term.title: amide oximes

item.text: Compounds having the structure RC(NH2)=NOH and derivatives formed by substitution; formally the oximes of carboxamides.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1315 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
